alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:25PM MDT until June 03 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 425 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 20 miles northwest of Kit Carson to 12 miles southeast of Boyero to 5 miles southeast of Wild Horse Point, or along a line extending from 20 miles south of Flagler to 61 miles southwest of Burlington to 35 miles north of North La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wild Horse Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
